channel.title: Runescape went hood?
channel.description:
Runescape went all hood. click the link (promise nothing bad like porn, its just runescape) It was translated by http://www.gizoogle.com/ . If you can't see anything, scroll down and read the links and text there.
I used a tiny url cause the link was really long.
[size=18pt][url=http://tinyurl.com/blackpeople]www.Runescape.com[/url][/size]
heres the unedited link:
http://sites.gizoogle.com/index2.php?url=http%3A%2F%2Fnews.runescape.com%2Fp%3DkKmok3kJqOeN6D3mDdihco3oPeYN2KFy6W5--vZUbNA%2Fnewsitem.ws%3Fid%3D1297
gizoogle.com is a translator site that I guess translates the page into "hood" speak. like people from the "hood" talk. (Quote from Tom's [translated] myspace page...
"Who I'd like ta meet: I'd like ta meet thugz who educate, inspire or entertain me... I have a few close niggaz I've knizzown all mah life fo shizzle. I'd like ta makes mizzle.")
not trying to be racist, but thats the only way I can think of to describe it."

Idiot.

Fat.

Amazing, original insult.[/quote]

I agree.

I didn’t know that it was posted yesterday. My bad.

Idiot.

Fat.
[/quote]
Bwohoho, my good sir. I see you’re feeling rather creative today![/quote]

Fat.
[/quote]

hahaha, you do know he doesn’t give a shit?[/quote]

don’t ever post again.
